data.actual_result: The switch bugs and starts to move without you click on it
data.short_description: After clicking twice the button to (de)activate "Show in Profile" (Connections), when you click one time normally, the sprite don't acts correctly
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Connections - Click twice in a row in any connection to don't show in your profile - Click normally one time in the button (it might take a time to the bug happens)
